author: Special Correspondent
text:
After undertaking a door-to-door campaign to reach out to every voter in the State, the ruling AIADMK will hold public meetings across the country for three days beginning January 17.

In a statement, Chief Minister and AIADMK general secretary Jayalalithaa said the party was organising massive public meetings in Tamil Nadu, Puducherry, Karnataka, Andhra Pradesh, Maharashtra, Kerala, New Delhi and Andaman as part of MGR’s 99{+t}{+h}birth anniversary celebrations.

The complete list has been published in the party organ, she said, adding that the MLAs and party seniors would participate in the meetings.

While party senior E. Madhusudhanan and C. Ponnaiyan will address the meetings in Alandur and Sadiapet respectively, Finance Minister O. Panneerselvam will address the public meeting at Kadambathur on January 17.
title: AIADMK to hold public meetings across country
